---
listing:
  contents: "blog/*.qmd"
  feed: true
  sort: "date desc"
  type: grid
  categories: false
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui:

    - subtitle
  image-placeholder: img/image-placeholder.png

format:
  html:
    theme:
      - iframe_match.scss
    include-in-header: preprocessing.html
